title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: I give my predictions head of time for anyone who want to make money.low bets hards to predict.Big bets good returns on investment and better odds to win than what showing on the bookies.UFC 280: Oliveira vs. Makhachev    (50$ on Makachev)Israel Adesanya vs. Alex Pereira (70$ on Alex )Dustin Poirier vs. Michael Chandler ($150 on porier)Petr Yan vs. Sean O’Malley (200$ on Sean)Carla Esparza vs. Zhang Weili (200$ on Carla)If you want to go safe on one bet then I would go all in on dustin vs chalnder (porier win)I am pretty sure he will beat him.

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on September 21, 2022, 07:09:03 AMI give my predictions head of time for anyone who want to make money.low bets hards to predict.Big bets good returns on investment and better odds to win than what showing on the bookies.UFC 280: Oliveira vs. Makhachev    (50$ on Makachev)Israel Adesanya vs. Alex Pereira (70$ on Alex )Dustin Poirier vs. Michael Chandler ($150 on porier)Petr Yan vs. Sean O’Malley (200$ on Sean)Carla Esparza vs. Zhang Weili (200$ on Carla)If you want to go safe on one bet then I would go all in on dustin vs chalnder (porier win)I am pretty sure he will beat him.You haven't even seen any lines for these fights have you.
